Class Manager

java.lang.Object
users.User
users.Tester
users.JuniorDeveloper
users.SeniorDeveloper
users.Manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Searchable, Sortable
public class Manager extends SeniorDeveloper
Manager user role can manage system users and view contact statistics.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Shows the Manager menu and performs actions based on user selection. Loops until the user selects Logout.
      Overrides:
